Html:
Does anyone have a smaller project file that would decouple all but the block generation and rendering?

The sample code is a awesome resource for learning the code and exhibiting the engines possibilities,
but it'd be nice if there was a really simple single project which could be included in a new solution without the need to replace the cameras , inputs etc.

I guess ideally a compiled .dll would be the most error free, but I would be super happy with just the bare bones project necessary to get the engine running with no frills.
